Iman Le Caire (onye amụrụ dịka Ayman Kassem) bụ onye Egypt na-agba egwú, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ahụ maka ikike LGBT nke bi na New York City.
Le Caire bụ onye na-agba egwú na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Cairo Opera House mgbe ọ gbapụrụ Ijipt iji zere mkpagbu maka ịbụ onye LGBT

N'afọ 2008, ọ gbagara United States, ebe e nyere ya ebe mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, o wee kwaga New York City, ebe o mechara nwee ike ịwa ahụ maka mgbanwe mmekọahụ n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ighọ nwanyị. Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe, onye na-agba egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Mgbalị ya emeela ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya obodo LGBT nke obodo ahụ, yana Fire Island Pines na Cherry Grove.
N'afọ 2017, Le Caire pụtara na vidiyo egwu Zolita Fight Like a Girl na 2021 gosipụtara Layla na The Shuroo Process, nke Emrhys Cooper dere ma duzie.

Ọnwụ George Floyd na Mee 2020 na ogbugbu Sarah Hegazi gburu onwe ya, onye na-edina nwanyị nke a tụrụ mkpọrọ maka igosi ọkọlọtọ rainbow n'egwuregwu na-akatọ mmegide obi ọjọọ nke Egypt na ikike LGBT, gbara Le Caire ume isonye na-akwalite ikike nke ndị LGBT.

N'oge ọrịa COVID-19, Le Caire nyeere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ndị transgender aka ịgbapụ na mba ha, ebe a na-akpagbu ha. N'ikpeazụ, ọ sonyeere otu TransEmigrate Association, nke na-enyere ndị transgender aka na-agbalị ịkwaga mba ndị dị nchebe, nke ọ bụ onye njikwa mmekọrịta ndị Arab na onye otu bọọdụ
N'afọ 2021, o guzobere otu nwanne nwanyị Trans Asylias, nke na-enyere ndị transgender aka ịchọ ebe mgbaba.
N'afọ 2021, edepụtara Le Caire dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị otu narị.
